com.rbbn.cpaas.mobile

Class CPaaS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbbn.cpaas.mobile.CPaaS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CPaaS
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Main Service Provider class of the Mobile SDK.

    Mobile SDK users should create one instance of this class for every user account they want to handle. Note that, account info will be kept internal to this class, and will be set after when SDK user calls one of the connect methods on Authentication.

    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthentication

        public Authentication getAuthentication()
        Returns Authentication instance.

        Authentication manages the connection to CPaaS backend. Subscribes a websocket channel for notification and all service instances to the backend.

        Returns:
        authentication instance

      • getCallService

        public CallService getCallService()
        Returns CallService instance.

        CallService manages basic and advanced WebRTC call flows and SIP operations through CPaaS backend.

        Returns:
        authentication instance

      • getPushManager

        public PushManager getPushManager()
        Returns PushManager instance.

        PushManager manages subscription of push notification channel for the application and provides ability of injecting the push notifications to Mobile SDK.

        Returns:
        authentication instance

      • getSMSService

        public SMSService getSMSService()
        Returns SMSService instance.

        SMSService manages sending and receiving SMS messages through CPaaS backend.

        Returns:
        authentication instance

      • getChatService

        public ChatService getChatService()
        Returns ChatService instance.

        ChatService manages sending and receiving instant chat messages through CPaaS backend.

        Returns:
        authentication instance
